content.rendered:
BRUSSELS FASHION WEEK

From October 5th to October 8th, 2023


WHAT IS BRUSSELS FASHIONWEEK

*Shows will take the format of either a runway show or static presentation 

depending on location and concepts, that includes


More on: www.brusselsfashionweek.com and @brusselsfashionweekofficial
